title: [Epidemiology] Children younger than 5 years with mild to moderate COVID-19 have high amounts of SARS-CoV-2 viral RNA in their nasopharynx compared with older children and adults, finds new study in JAMA Pediatrics (30 July 2020). Young children can potentially be important drivers of SARS-CoV-2 spread.
[Medicine] The Oxford COVID-19 vaccine prevents SARS-CoV-2 pneumonia in rhesus macaques, finds new study in Nature (30 July 2020). No pneumonia was observed in vaccinated animals.
